    @Named(value="xstream")
public class CDIXStreamDataFormatWithGoodClassLoader
extends org.apache.camel.dataformat.xstream.XStreamDataFormat
    Mandatory for xstream camel processing (xstream is not able to recognize its classloader.
    Author:
    charliemordant
